extendedInfo.description: NOTE: FREE Version of this application is available (under the name of IELTS Writing General) for you to check out applicationâs features to meet your needs before buying!To help you be familiar with an IELTS Writing Test, IEWriting General Pro introduces you with a variety of common topics which are frequently used in this test. IEWriting General Pro:-	Includes over 40 exam questions (many have been seen in real tests)-	Covers most common types of essays (for and against, opinion, solutions to problems)-	Covers most common types of letters (letters of request, letters of complaint...)-	Introduces a plenty of techniques as well as useful tips and tricks for you to improve your band score.That is more than enough for you to prepare for an IELTS Writing Test.Academic candidates also find it helpful in many sections dealing with task 2 (since these two tasks are similar in both modules). Good Luck!

reviews.comment: What\'s the diffrence between this pro,which is 57 bucks,and free version? At least I didn\'t find any. Please don\'t buy this as its ditto same as the free version.
reviews.author: shelly gairola
